description.displayText: My family used Melanie when we were in town for a wedding. She was so experienced, so warm with our child, and had that hard to explain factor that children warm up to. We felt very comfortable leaving our 1 year old in her care. Would definitely use her if we were in town again or recommend her to friends.

description.displayText: Mel is a thoughtful and proactive caregiver with great communications skills and instincts. She cared for my daughter from 6 to 14 months old until a job change in our family meant we didn't require nanny services. I'd hire Mel again!
description.originalText: Mel is a thoughtful and proactive caregiver with great communications skills and instincts. She cared for my daughter from 6 to 14 months old until a job change in our family meant we didn't require nanny services. I'd hire Mel again!

description.displayText: Mel is an amazingly adept caregiver who helped my family in ways that are hard to sum in a few short lines. She started with our family when my boys were 6 months and 24 months and, as you can imagine, it was a madhouse. She came in and brought order to all of our madness and we cannot ever thank her enough. We parted ways when she relocated but she was a near daily part of our lives for a year and she continues to be a loving presence in our children's lives even from thousands of miles away. If you're looking for someone who goes above and beyond who will support you as a family and make your children feel loved each day, you could do no better.

description.displayText: Mel was a great addition to our family and my children (8, 10) adore her. She was thoughtful, diligent and attentive to their needs, facilitating a productive and supportive environment and managing everything from homework and social/ friend connections, to an organized home environment that allowed them to thrive and us to have full confidence they were in the best care. Beyond, she supported our family with professional and effective household management, which was a lifesaver to two working parents. She is now a part of our extended family and we are incredibly grateful. Certainly highly recommend her.
